text: A ⸤reputation⸥\f + \fr 22:1 \ft Literally “name” \f* \add is\add* to be chosen ⸤rather than⸥\f + \fr 22:1 \ft Literally “from” \f* great riches;
⸤favor is better than silver and gold⸥.\f + \fr 22:1 \ft Literally “from silver and from gold, favor \fq is \ft better” \f*
Rich and poor have \add much\add* in common;
Yahweh is the maker of all of them.
The clever sees danger and hides,
but the simple go on and suffer.
The reward of humility \add is\add* the fear of Yahweh—
wealth and honor and life.
Thorns \add and\add* snares \add are\add* in the way of the perverse;
he who guards himself\f + \fr 22:5 \ft Or “soul,” or “life” \f* will keep away from them.
Train the child ⸤concerning his way⸥;\f + \fr 22:6 \ft Literally “on the mouth of his way” \f*
even when he is old, he will not stray from it.
The rich will rule over the poor,
and the borrower is a slave of ⸤the lender⸥.\f + \fr 22:7 \ft Literally “the borrower \fq belonging \ft to a man” \f*
He who sows injustice will reap calamity,
and the rod of his anger will fail.
He \add who\add* ⸤is generous⸥\f + \fr 22:9 \ft Literally “the generous of eye” \f* will be blessed,
for he gives to the poor from his \add own\add* bread.
Drive out a scoffer and strife will go out;
quarrel and abuse will cease.
He who loves purity of heart
\add and has\add*⸤gracious speech⸥,\f + \fr 22:11 \ft Literally “grace of his lips” \f* his friend \add is the\add* king.
The eyes of Yahweh keep watch over knowledge,
but he will overthrow the words of the faithless.
A lazy person says “A lion in the street!
In the middle of the highway, I shall be killed!”
A deep pit is the mouth of an ⸤adulteress⸥,\f + \fr 22:14 \ft Literally “a strange woman” \f*
\add he with whom\add* Yahweh is angry will fall there.
Folly is bound up in the heart\f + \fr 22:15 \ft Or “mind” \f* of a boy;\f + \fr 22:15 \ft Or “young man,” or “adolescent” \f*
\add the\add* rod of discipline will drive it\f + \fr 22:15 \ft That is, folly \f* from him.
He who oppresses the poor \add in order\add* to enrich himself,
\add or\add* gives to the rich, ⸤will come to poverty⸥.\f + \fr 22:16 \ft Literally “only loss” \f*
Words of the Wise
Incline your ear and hear the words of the wise;
you shall apply your heart\f + \fr 22:17 \ft Or “mind” \f* to my teaching.
For \add it is\add* pleasant if you guard them ⸤within you⸥;\f + \fr 22:18 \ft Literally “in your belly/womb” \f*
together they will be ready upon your lips.
\add In order\add* for your trust to be in Yahweh,
I have made \add them\add* known to you ⸤today⸥\f + \fr 22:19 \ft Literally “the day” \f*—even\f + \fr 22:19 \ft Or “only” \f* you.
Have I not written for you thirty \add sayings\add*
with admonitions and knowledge?
\add In order\add* to show you what is right—sayings of truth—
\add in order\add* to return a true saying to him who sent you.
Do not rob the poor because he is poor,
and do not crush the afflicted at the gate;
For Yahweh will plead their case
and despoil those who despoil them of life.\f + \fr 22:23 \ft Or “soul,” or “inner self” \f*
Do not befriend an owner\f + \fr 22:24 \ft Or “master” \f* of ⸤anger⸥,\f + \fr 22:24 \ft Literally “nostril” \f*
and with a man of wrath you shall not associate;
lest you learn his way
and become entangled in a snare to yourself.\f + \fr 22:25 \ft Or “soul,” or “inner self” \f*
Do not be with those who ⸤give a pledge⸥\f + \fr 22:26 \ft Literally “strike a hand” \f*
⸤by becoming⸥\f + \fr 22:26 \ft Literally “in the becomings of” \f* surety.
If there is nothing for you to pay,\f + \fr 22:27 \ft Or “complete” \f*
why will he take your bed from under you?
Do not remove an ancient boundary marker
which your ancestors\f + \fr 22:28 \ft Or “fathers” \f* made.
A man who is skillful in his work, you shall see:
before kings, he will serve;
he will not serve before the commoners.
